---
title: "Gustavo Farias – Cientista de Dados & COO"
format:
  html:
    css: portfolio.css
    include-in-header: |
      <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {

          /* Navegação suave */
          document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', e => {
              e.preventDefault();
              const target = document.querySelector(anchor.getAttribute('href'));
              if (target) target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
            });
          });

          /* Menu mobile */
          const menuBtn   = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-button');
          const menu      = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');
          const iconOpen  = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-icon');
          const iconClose = document.getElementById('mobile-close-icon');

          if (menuBtn && menu && iconOpen && iconClose) {
            menuBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
              menu.classList.toggle('open');
              const opened = menu.classList.contains('open');
              iconOpen .style.display = opened ? 'none' : 'block';
              iconClose.style.display = opened ? 'block' : 'none';
            });
          }

          /* Destacar seção ativa */
          const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section[id]');
          const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
          window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
            const pos = window.scrollY + 100;
            let active = '';
            sections.forEach(sec => {
              if (pos >= sec.offsetTop && pos < sec.offsetTop + sec.offsetHeight) {
                active = sec.id;
              }
            });
            navLinks.forEach(link => {
              link.classList.toggle('active', link.hash === '#' + active);
            });
          });
        });
      </script>
---
